text: Ara amara tadera pascate mara'iyama-putra â€˜isake [1] pathiyechilama, tara samane ta'orata theke ya bidyamana rayeche tara satyata pratipannakarirupe. Ara amara take injila diyechilama, ete rayeche hedayata o alo; ara ta chila tara samane abasista ta'oratera satyata pratipannakari ebam muttakidera jan'ya hedayata o upadesasbarupa
